title: Kindle Paperwhite (11th Gen) - Frozen Screen
summary: Hard reset instructions for unresponsive or frozen e-ink screens.
content:
If the screen is stuck on a book page or screensaver: 
1. Press and hold the power button on the bottom edge. 
2. Continue holding for a full 40 seconds. Ignore any 'Restart' dialog boxes on the screen. 
3. Release the button only when the screen flashes or the progress bar appears.
